userdoc.notice: This abstract contract adds a simple non-specific follow validation function. NOTE: Both the `HUB` variable and `_checkFollowValidity()` function are exposed to inheriting contracts. NOTE: This is only compatible with COLLECT & REFERENCE MODULES.
